alert.note: Alert for Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 4:56AM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected, along with patchy freezing drizzle. Total snow accumulations ranging from a dusting in deepest valleys up to around 2 inches above 3,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Light ice accumulations on bridges, overpasses, and elevated surfaces. * WHERE...Harlan County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and limited visibility, especially when traveling over the higher elevations such as Black Mountain. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.
